M.O.N.T

Introduction

Roda is a South Korean rapper-songwriter under FM Entertainment. He is the rapper of the boy group M.O.N.T. He is best known for participating in the survival show MIXNINE.

On March 26, 2021, he made his solo debut with the digital single "Anxious".
